Introduction

A. Brief explanation of React Hooks and their benefits B. Problem with useState in large TypeScript projects

Prerequisites

You should be able to follow this tutorial if you have a basic understanding of Node.js and TypeScript. If you're new to TypeScript, get my free guide: TypeScript Essentials: 5 Critical Keys to Using TypeScript Effectively

Outline

Here's an overview of the steps we'll take in this tutorial:

  • Setup & Config
    • Clone the project
    • Install Dependencies

I. Introduction A. Brief explanation of React Hooks and their benefits B. Problem with useState in large TypeScript projects

II. Refactoring with Custom Hooks A. Identify a useState-based component with complex state logic B. Extract the state logic into a custom hook C. Show how custom hooks improve code readability and reusability

III. TypeScript Integration A. Demonstrate how to add TypeScript types to the custom hook B. Explain the advantages of TypeScript in catching errors early

IV. Conclusion A. Recap the benefits of using custom hooks in TypeScript B. Encourage viewers to implement custom hooks to simplify their React code C. Thank viewers for watching and invite them to check out more content

V. Outro A. Thanking viewers for their time B. Reminding viewers to like, share, and subscribe C. Mentioning any upcoming content or projects on the channel.
